AdditionalRequirements.Requirement: You must bring four people; one of every vocation (knight, druid, sorcerer, paladin).

Instruction.Text: From Venore, head down the south-west stairs.
The Desert Dungeon is located in the desert to the west of venore.@Head to the desert quest dungeon, and down the hole.
Traverse the dungeon, and go up the ladder.
Go up the stairs to the left; then follow the path.
Walk all the way north-east, ignore the other holes.

Enter the room, place the items on the basins and have the person of the specified vocation stand on the corresponding switch tiles. After positioning yourself correctly, pull the lever.@Item=Sword@Knight: Sword, South@Item=Spellbook@Sorcerer: Spellbook, East@Item=Red Apple@Druid: Red Apple, West@Item=Crossbow@Paladin: Crossbow, North

AdditionalRequirements.Requirement: You must be ranked relic hunter or higher in the Explorer's Society.

Instruction.Text: NPC=Habdel@(Male) Go to Habdel and ask him about his outfit.@Item=Coral Comb@He will ask you to retrieve a Coral Comb.
NPC=Ishina@(Female) Go to Ishina and ask her about her outfit.
NPC=Marina@Travel to Meriana and ask her about a comb.@You must complete the {Quest|Shattered Isles Quest|Eleonore Quest} to go there.
NPC=Captain Max@Go to Captain Max at Liberty Bay and travel to Calassa.@This requires relic hunter rank in the {Quest|The Explorer Society|Explorer Society}.

CR=Massive Water Elemental@Traverse Calassa to the room containing the Coral Comb. Be prepared to encounter many Quaras.@CR=Quara Predator@CR=Quara Hydromancer@CR=Quara Pincher@CR=Quara Mantassin@@After collecting the Coral Comb, give it to the starting NPC to obtain the addon.
NPC=Razan@(Male) Go to Razan and ask him about his outfit.@After that, hand him the required items to obtain the Turban.
NPC=Miraia@(Female) Go to Miraia and ask her about her outfit.@After that, hand her the required items to obtain the Turban.

NPC=Omrabas@Go to Omrabas by using a shovel on the loose stone pile.@Then ask him for a mission.@Item=Ghoul Snack@He asks for two ghoul snacks.@Item=Demonic Skeletal Hand@Next, Omrabas asks you for two demonic skeletal hands.
Item=Omrabas' Heart@Go to the ruins at the northern tip of Drefia. Levitate up and go down the stairs.@@@Enter the teleporter and break the Dusty Amphoras until you find Omrabas' Heart.
Omrabas will ask for a simulated brain.@Head to the main building, and down two sets of stairs.

CR=Necromancer@Head to the sacrifical altar, watch out for necromancers.@Put the two Half-Eaten Brains on the sacrificial altars and use the machine north of it. A Stimulated Brain will appear on the central altar.

CR=Snake@Next, Omrabas will ask you to bring something to use as intestines.@@Find a live snake and use the empty vial on it.@There are a number of snakes on the hills to Drefia.@There is also a snake down the stairs in the main building.
Omrabas asks you to find three dragon tears.@@@Head to the hole to the north-east of Drefia and down the hole.
Head to the south and go down another hole. Then walk through the teleporter. Here you will need to dig up three dragon tears.
Item=Small Dragon Tear@After going down the hole, dig up the three dragon tears using a shovel.

AdditionalRequirements.Requirement: You need 500 oz. of capacity for Mission 9.
You need two people to open the path to the teleporter.
You need a total of four people to do this quest.

Quest.Name: The Queen of the Banshees Quest

AdditionalRequirements.Requirement: You must have completed [The Shattered Isles Quest] (Eleonore Part).
You must have completed [The Sweaty Cyclops Quest].
You must bring four people; one of every vocation (knight, druid, sorcerer, paladin).
You only need the demonic essence to unlock the first and second addons of the outfit.
You must have completed the [Barbarian Test Quest].
You must have completed the [Barbarian Test Quest].
There are three different arena tiers.
Greenhorn: 1000 gold.
Scrapper: 5000 gold.
Warlord: 10000 gold.
You must have completed [The Ice Islands Quest].
You must have completed the [Barbarian Test Quest].
You must have completed the [Barbarian Test Quest].
You must have completed [The Ice Islands Quest].
You must have completed [The Ice Islands Quest] until Formorgar Mines 1.
You must have completed [Dreamer's Challenge Quest] Mission 4 for the outfit.
You must have completed [Dreamer's Challenge Quest] Mission 5 for Addon 1 (hand in 500 demonic essence).
You must have completed [Dreamer's Challenge Quest] Mission 6 for Addon 2 (hand in 1500 demonic essence).
You must have completed [Dreamer's Challenge Quest] Mission 4 for the outfit.
You must have completed [Dreamer's Challenge Quest] Mission 5 for Addon 1 (hand in 500 demonic essence).
You must have completed [Dreamer's Challenge Quest] Mission 6 for Addon 2 (hand in 1500 demonic essence).
You need to have finished [Arito's Task Quest].
You cannot do this quest if you have started or completed the [The Djinn War - Marid Faction].
You must have completed [The White Raven Monastery Quest].
You must have completed [The Queen of the Banshees Quest].

Quest.Name: The Hunt for the Sea Serpent Quest

AdditionalRequirements.Requirement: You must bring four people; one of every vocation (knight, druid, sorcerer, paladin).
Note: the required items will not be consumed.
You must have killed 6666 Demons in the [Killing in the Name of... Quest].
You must have completed Mission 3 of [The Inquisition Quest].

Quest.Name: The Hidden City of Beregar Quest

AdditionalRequirements.Requirement: You must have completed [The Ultimate Booze Quest].
You must have completed [The Queen of the Banshees Quest].
This quest can only be completed in the month of August.
Must have completed [The New Frontier Quest] (Mission 08).
Must have completed [The New Frontier Quest].
Must have completed [Wrath of the Emperor Quest].
Must have completed [The Spirit Will Get You Quest].
Must have completed [Barbarian Test Quest].
Must have completed [The White Raven Monastery Quest] (Mission 01).
Must have completed [The New Frontier Quest] (Mission 01).
Must have completed [Children of the Revolution Quest].
Must have completed [The New Frontier Quest] (Mission 09).
Must have completed [The Ape City Quest] (Mission 09).
This quest can only be completed in the month of September.

Quest.Name: Rottin Wood and the Married Men Quest

AdditionalRequirements.Requirement: Must have completed [Sea of Light Quest].
Must have completed [Sea of Light Quest].
Must have completed [Research and Development Quest].
The Lightbearer Event occurs in the month of November.
The Bewitched Event occurs in the month of January.
A Piece of Cake starts on February 21st.
The Colours of Magic starts on March 15th and on September 15th.
The Demon's Lullaby starts on May 7th.
Annual Autumn Vintage starts on October 1st and October 17th.
A Pirate's Death to Me occurs on the 18th-23th of each month.
Last Creep Standing occurs on the 20th of each month.
Must have completed [The Annihilator Quest].
Must have completed [Demon Helmet Quest].
Must have completed [The Demon Oak Quest].
Must have 100 fame points awarded by the [Spike Tasks Quest].
Must have completed a few missions of the [Roshamuul Quest].
Must have completed the [Dark Trails Quest].
Must have cast 150 votes (earned in [Oramond Quest]).

Quest.Name: Twenty Miles Beneath the Sea Quest

AdditionalRequirements.Requirement: Must have completed the [Ferumbras' Ascendant Quest].
Must have completed the [Barbarian Test Quest].
